title: Minnie's Science Spectacular!
description: When Minnie is asked to do a science presentation in school, she feels very anxious and stressed. She thinks she isn’t as smart as the other students because science is hard. However, her teacher explains that being smart can take many different forms. Minnie is inspired by her teacher’s advice to embrace her own creativity, and she begins preparing her "Science Spectacular!" Minnie also learns that the strengths that live inside her are what make her special.
author: Jessica Azenberg
